knimeNode.name: Extended Statistics
knimeNode.shortDescription: Calculates statistic moments with their distributions as histograms and counts nominal values and their occurrences across all columns.

fullDescription.intro: This node calculates statistical moments such as minimum, maximum, mean, standard deviation, variance, median, overall sum, number of missing values and row count across all numeric columns, and counts all nominal values together with their occurrences. The dialog offers two options for choosing the median and/or nominal values calculations:

tab.name: Settings
tab.option: Select this option if for all numeric columns the medians are computed. Note, this computation might be expensive, since it requires to sort all column independently to find the values that divides the distribution into two halves of the same number of values.
Filter columns for counting all possible values.
Adjusts the number of counts for both, top number of frequent and infrequent occurrences of categorical values per column (displayed in the node view!).
Adjusts the maximum number of possible values per column in the nominal output table.

tab.name: Histogram
tab.option: The histogram cells should be in SVG or PNG format.

ports.inPort: Table from which to compute statistics.
ports.outPort: Table with all nominal value histograms.
Table with all nominal values and their counts.

views.view: Displays all statistic moments (for all numeric columns) and nominal values (for all categorical columns).
